wikipedia_page.main: Sir Thomas Robert Bethell (8 May 1867 – 23 December 1957) was a British barrister and Liberal Party politician. He was Liberal MP for Maldon, Essex from 1906–10.

response: Bethell was the son of George Bethell and his wife Frances (née Tipper), and was educated at King's College London. His younger brother was Sir Thomas Bethell (1867–1957).
